alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Camden to near Poland. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Lee, Trenton, Floyd, Camden, Boonville, Forestport, Steuben, Florence, and Ava. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
